name: Christena Heitzman
bio:
GAISER IN MEMORU OF GEORGE A. GAISER
DIED MARCH 7, 1902
AGED 79 YRS. 9 MOS. 15 DS.
SALOME SCHWARTZ 1866-1936
WIFE OF WILLIAM H. GAISER 1864-1964
LULU O DELL 1896-1963
IN MEMORY OF AGATHA
WIFE OF ADAM G. GAISER
DIED JULY 14, 1889 AGED 59 YRS. 5 MS. 9 DS.
CHRISTENA HEITZMAN
BORN 1804 DIED FEB.2, 1896
